title: Minecraft 1.5（红石更新）特性列表
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
本条目为DJXGAME与sjjklh翻译自http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Redstone_Update并发表在http://zh.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/红石更新 的Minecraft 1.5正式版的更新特性列表。

转载请注明Wiki地址，否则视为侵权
1.5于3月13日发布。

如有错误敬请告知！
最后更新：2013-3-9


常规重写渲染引擎
渲染提升需要更高级的OpenGL特性设置
这将导致一些过时的硬件和濒临淘汰的硬件无法参与游戏
全局渲染速度加快，进而增加FPS数。[3][4]
光照引擎改进
某些方块的光照提升一些光照方面的改进添加了平滑光照最小化选项
最小化选项将使用传统的平滑光照，而最大化则会修复楼梯的光照问题
材质包改进
材质包会对每一个方块和物品使用独立的文件，并在运行时将其拼在一起，材质包的尺寸不需要一致可以为任何方块和物品通过在右侧对应的.png内下方添加关键帧的方式添加动画
可以选择在.txt中自定义每帧的顺序和持续时间
水、岩浆、指南针、钟有着独特的规则当前的材质包会"自动"转换如果材质包文件缺少图片会自动使用原版材质补齐支持高清材质与字体[5]支持更改字体

游戏内容加入计分板系统
旨在为地图作者和服务器管理员提供便捷。
适合PVP服务器。
通过使用/scoreboard命令或者命令方块进行触发 。计分板可以用来统计死亡信息、玩家击杀其他玩家数、玩家杀敌数以及玩家使用命令的次数。为一整套包含名称、显示名称、准则、以及玩家对应数据的复合系统。包含自定义名称颜色，友军开火选项以及玩家和队伍之间切换等团队功能。在玩家姓名标签下显示分数
物品栏的改进
双击物品会尽可能地堆叠该物品。拖拽堆叠的物品可以进行分离。在该格未被占用时，使用鼠标右键拖拽物品可以在该格内放置一个该物品。在物品合成区域⇧ Shift+ 双击物品可以将所有物品移至物品栏。⇧ Shift+ 双击可堆叠物品可以将所有该物品的其他堆叠移至物品栏该区域。当鼠标悬停至物品栏或某一容器内的某一物品上时按[size=0.85em]Q可以丢弃该物品。手持盔甲可以通过右键装备。
改进的死亡信息显示
现包括死因, 玩家杀死了另一玩家以及所持武器的名称.
Player fell off a ladderPlayer fell off some vinesPlayer fell out of the waterPlayer fell from a high placePlayer fell into a patch of firePlayer fell into a patch of cactiPlayer got finished off by Player or Mob using WeaponPlayer walked into a fire whilst fighting Player or MobPlayer was burnt to a crisp whilst fighting Player or MobPlayer tried to swim in lava while trying to escape Player or MobPlayer walked into a cactus while trying to escape Player or MobPlayer was slain by Player or Mob using WeaponPlayer was killed trying to hurt Player or Mob
改进的重命名系统
改进刷怪蛋的重命名机制
在通过重命名后的刷怪蛋中生成的生物会显示其名称，同时该姓名也会在死亡信息中出现。通过使用NBT标签修改其名称标签可以使生物显示其自定义的名称。通过刷怪蛋生成的生物在其半径6方格范围内会在其头上显示其名称。
改进容器的重命名机制
重命名后的箱子、陷阱箱、发射器、熔炉、炼药锅以及附魔台会在其GUI页面中显示其新名称。重命名后的命令方块可以在聊天窗口使用其新的名称
语言文件
可以通过后台下载器上传语言文件。
不需要新版Minecraft发布即可获得。
选项和标题页面
将材质包按钮自开始页面移入选项菜单中。全新的聊天设置以及多人游戏设置
可以自定义尺寸, 聊天窗口高度、显示高度以及宽度
改进的创造模式
在创造模式，你在距离玩家或生物五方格远时即可攻击对方。
玩家在登出后仍会保持骑着载具/生物（如：你坐着矿车登出，那么矿车将与你一块登出）
加入/effect命令
使用格式/effect <玩家> <药水效果> [持续秒数] [倍率]
加入Minecraft领域
仍在开发中

方块与物品加入红石比较器
基于电容器的创意合成原料包括3个红石火把，1个下界石英以及3个石头外观与中继器类似，但有2个输入端
如果输入A的强度大于或等于B，输出有两种可能：与A相等，或是A与B强度之差。
两种输出可用右键切换
如果输入A的强度小于B，无输出。
当其后端与一个容器（末影箱除外）接触时，比较器会发出与容器里物品栏填满程度百分比成正比的强度的信号，或者对于音符盒则为里面播放的唱片的编号。/testfor命令（只能被命令方块执行）可以与红石比较器配合使用
加入漏斗
合成原料包括5个铁锭与1个箱子其可以从其上的容器吸取物品或吸取掉落在其上的物品，并向其指向的容器输出物品。（末影箱除外）允许众多自动化物品收集、处理系统的实现对漏斗供电可以阻止其从别的容器吸取物品[6]
加入投掷器
合成原料包括7个圆石与1个红石粉红石驱动型方块，外观以及作用都与发射器类似，除了：
投掷器会把所有物品都原样以掉落物形式丢出来，而发射器的话会把弹射物，例如箭、蛋等发射出去。[7]投掷器前面如果是带有物品栏的容器，那么投掷器在激活时会把物品注入到容器里一次。
能够朝向6个方向。朝上或朝下时材质不同接收到红石信号只会发射一次。想再次发射的话，信号必须关闭，再打开（之前在收到信号且毗邻方块更改时均会发射）
加入阳光传感器
合成原料包括3个木质台阶，3个下界石英与3个玻璃输出信号强度与阳光强度相关
加入陷阱箱
合成原料包括1个箱子与1个绊线钩输出的信号强度与正在查看箱子物品栏的玩家数量相关陷阱箱与普通箱子之间可以相邻陷阱箱可以激活下方相隔一个方块的红石，但横向不可以[8]材质与普通箱子略有差异：锁头旁有淡淡的红色
加入测重压力板
用于探测掉落的物品数量轻质（金质）达到完全输出需要60个物品重质（铁质）达到完全输出需要600个物品信号强度随物品数量线性增长
加入红石块
由9个红石粉合成，可用于贮存也为持续性电源，可用作可推拉的电源方块
加入下界石英
开采或熔炼下界石英矿石而得为阳光传感器与红石比较器的必要原料
加入地狱砖
熔炼地狱岩而得
改进地狱砖块
原名“地狱砖”，加入对应物品之后改为现名可由4个地狱砖合成而得
加入下界石英矿石
开采后掉落1个下界石英可熔炼为下界石英只能通过精准采集魔咒而得幸运魔咒可以提高掉落率
加入石英块
由4个下界石英合成而得有重要的装饰性用途
加入石英台阶
由3个石英块合成而得与其他石质台阶性能相同有重要的装饰性用途
加入石英楼梯
由6个石英块以同样的楼梯合成配方合成而得与其他石质楼梯性能相同
加入錾制石英块
由2个石英台阶合成而得有重要的装饰性用途
加入竖纹石英块
由2个石英块合成而得有重要的装饰性用途与木头方块类似，可以侧倒放置
加入激活铁轨
合成原料包括2个木棍，6个铁锭与1个红石火把可用于触发TNT矿车可用于停止漏斗矿车的工作红石供电可以激活连接着的最远8格的激活铁轨
改进探测铁轨
背向毗邻的红石比较器能够根据经过矿车所存物品栏的装满程度发出对应强度的信号添加激活状态的材质
改进矿车加入TNT矿车
合成原料包括1个TNT与1个矿车由激活铁轨触发爆炸烈度与其速度相关创造模式中左键点击也能爆炸不会破坏铁轨与支撑铁轨的方块
加入漏斗矿车[9]
合成原料包括1个漏斗与1个矿车只会在经过漏斗上时才能被倒空可以在经过容器下时吸取物品
加入刷怪箱矿车实体[10]
只能通过地图编辑器获取只有实体，没有对应物品与刷怪箱的NBT结构相同
重建岩浆的材质改进水
创建无限水水源时下方不再需要方块支撑，但还是需要至少1个水源方块这意味着用水桶也不会破坏河流或海洋的景观了
改进骨粉
每次使用只能随机性地催熟若干个生长阶段对于树苗则需要2-4个才能长成树使用时会发出绿色颗粒
加入与改进双层台阶
43:8为“平滑双层石台阶”43:9为“平滑双层沙石台阶”
改进发射器
可以为1格内的玩家装备盔甲可以放置同时激活TNT可以使用骨粉催熟前方的作物或树苗可以使用打火石在前方点火，但会消耗耐久能够朝向6个方向。朝上或朝下时材质不同接收到红石信号只会发射一次。想再次发射的话，信号必须关闭，再打开（之前在收到信号且毗邻方块更改时均会发射）
移除上锁的箱子的材质
现在使用“材质丢失”材质
不同高度的雪
完全支持多层雪
每一层雪掉落1个雪球每一层雪都有自己的碰撞箱
除了最上面那一层。所以玩家看上去总是陷进雪地里一点在视觉上，4层雪与台阶等高，但5层雪才与台阶的碰撞箱等高
3个雪块可合成6个雪层
改进信标
作用范围扩大
1层：20格2层：30格3层：40格4层：50格
楼梯
光照效果改进不会阻断疾跑

生物新的骷髅人工智能
现在射程为16格，以前为10格目标越接近，攻击速度越快
新的僵尸人工智能
会在发现玩家时通知所有附近的僵尸血量越少越强大着火时也会波及接触的玩家被远程攻击时也会追寻而来
改进史莱姆
在沼泽生物群系的生成率与月相相关
改进所有生物
如果不是在追赶玩家，所有生物都不会自行跨越铁轨生物现在能骑在（骑在其他生物上的）其他生物/载具的生物之上

世界生成为下界添加下界石英矿石
分布率约为每区块69个
改进废弃矿井的物品生成
生成的物品改为储存在运输矿车中


漏洞修复（这一节没动力翻译了……）
Fixed 81 bugs (Issue tracker) The following fixes are only for bugs which were present in a previous stable version of Minecraft. For the full list of bug fixes in snapshots see the Development version history.
MC-69 – Pigs constantly jumping, when player control them on half slabs and stairsMC-93 - Signs light up when mousing over creative inventory slotsMC-127 – Piston extended and retracted at the same timeMC-136 – Visual glitch on retracting pistonMC-177 – Clocked piston arm turns invisible when exiting game/dying/etc.MC-184 – Powered redstone doesnt update rightMC-195 – Flowing water still drags the player while flyingMC-220 – Z-fighting of iron bars / glass panes with the block below / aboveMC-302 – TNT explosion delayed until exiting and re-entering worldMC-320 – You can place Vines into VinesMC-415 – Leaves replace transparent blocksMC-515 – Chest glitch that lets them appear as if they are opened while they are notMC-519 – Achievements lost after updateMC-547 – Arrows Don't land properlyMC-562 – Breeding cows can consume more than one wheatMC-592 – Dying stacked leather armor duplicates the armorMC-666 – Spawn Protection not working properlyMC-737 – Map scaling breaks the map sometimesMC-835 – In the server log, /say commands performed by the server do not appear to the console but do appear to the players.MC-855 – Graphical Piston GlitchMC-916 – Water does not form source blocks properly on top of existing source blocksMC-997 – Clouds have a transparency when you are above/in them but not when you're underneath them.MC-1086 – Command block/Repeater interacting weirdlyMC-1324 – /difficulty command doesn't produce any messagesMC-1446 – Different timings on pistons in near same environmentMC-1524 – Baby mob collision boxes are too largeMC-1570 – Levers have random orientation when placedMC-1619 – Infinite rail duplication glitchMC-1642 – Minecart noise gets stuck on long cart rides | Bumping, choppy soundMC-1688 – Ender Egg falling render problemsMC-1775 – Hash size breaks redstoneMC-1914 – Mob spawners sometimes show up as pig spawnersMC-2196 – Map item placed in item frame experiences Z-fightingMC-2202 – Inconsistent pulse length/delay with torch and repeater combinationMC-2257 – Minecraft VERY slow to join/update a server, takes LONG time to login (30 seconds/ 1 min)MC-2416 – Suffocation/jittering/stuck when spawning in a newly created worldMC-2503 – Boats and minecarts should not be dropped in CreativeMC-2512 – Village lamp post floating torchesMC-2526 – Rain animation glitches through the ceilingMC-2582 – Powered/activator rail on slope stays powered/activatedMC-2711 – Jukebox crashes when breaking with no record insideMC-2806 – Anvils will sometimes hit the edge of a block and break instead of being placed.MC-2974 – Anvil name change costMC-2987 – Can't Sprint Going Up StairsMC-2989 – Block "resets" when right clicked with a food itemMC-3169 – Wither In Peaceful spawns very glitchyMC-3287 – Inconsistency with pistons pushing itemsMC-3316 – Armor enchantments (besides Thorns) have no effect on mobsMC-3339 – Tile entity crashing bugMC-3449 – Block breaking resets when the item you're holding changesMC-3597 – Floating minecart tracks when pushed by one-pulse pistonMC-3662 – Pistons and other Non-Solid blocksMC-3887 – Issues with name colors in tab listMC-3981 – Dispensers no longer dispense items through blocks in the downward direction.MC-4052 – Powered mechanisms react to change in redstone power levelMC-4232 – SpawnPotentials list working incorrectlyMC-4268 – Wither skeletons have wrong hitboxMC-4770 – Chat Shown: commands only broken - displays all chats but prevents me from submitting commands with "cannot send chat message"MC-5117 – Minecart does not make sounds when riding itMC-5368 – Mining with tools resets cracking action when damage values are updatedMC-5621 – Blocks like Redstone dust, Repeaters, Doors, Levers do not drop when the underlying block is pushed by a pistonMC-5691 – 1.4.6 - Windows 8 64x - Mouse: View issues/Accuracy error?MC-6131 – Crash upon reloading texture pack.MC-6699 – Reading Bytes in Minecraft code has a possible flawMC-7344 – Trapdoor is closed when redstone repeater is one block below and powered.MC-7595 – ID 73 & 74 Preset BugMC-8437 – URL parser does not detect 4 letter TLDsMC-8487 – Wither doesn't generate health when in minecartMC-8510 – Gamerule doMobLoot doesn't affect xp dropsMC-8647 – Death messages not translatableMC-9259 – FallingSand support for block IDs > 128MC-2555 Cannot Connect To Own Server While Not Online (LAN) / Playername being E-Mail address when offlineMC-6077 Comparators causes block updates while idleMC-7167 Hopper's name doesn't change in its GUI after renamed in anvilMC-9391 Command Block Arguments LengthMC-9473 Unnecessary delay of "Done" button in the texturepacks menuMC-9687 Hopper don't update comparator when receiving item stackMC-9788 Mob Spawners failing to "Saving entity NBT"MC-9935 EntityAIAvoidEntity InterferenceMC-10033 Scoreboard accepts arguments for @p but if not found it will use a wrong name
MC-1352 crowdin.net: Entry entity.WitherBoss.name is missing – German translation is "Withern"MC-1361 Self-Powered Redstone Lamp / Breaking a repeater with a piston pointing at a block won't stop the circuitMC-1680 Potatoes are not affected by the Fortune enchantmentMC-5413 Items with NBT data do not stack correctly due to serializationMC-5929 Cannot Drop Items in Creative ModeMC-6822 texturepacks no longer workMC-6903 Rail Duplication glitchMC-7147 World crashes after a few secondsMC-8802 blocks keep the redstone state when breaking a comparator that powers that blockMC-8932 Pistons can't destroy comparatorsMC-9382 Crash with 512x texture packMC-9576 Fortune doesn't affect the drop rate of apples and saplingsMC-9813 "Pick Block" on certain items then switching to survival creates infinite or ghost itemsMC-9817 When removing "Ghost Items" from the inventory, the number may be negative or zeroMC-10112 /clear with command blocks not working with armor that has been worn with custom damage values.MC-10309 GUI text is messed up when changing textures / Block & item textures replaced by letters or other texturesMC-10312 Minecraft crashes when a saddled pig you ride dies or when changing between rideable entitiesMC-10329 Pressing Single or Multiplayer Button crashes the gameMC-10330 Mining Fatigue broken
MC-16 – TP Bug when you sit in Minecart/Boat/Riding pigMC-32 – Minecart going in a circle will make any minecart close to them go super fast.MC-49 – Sounds: Fire extinguish sound does not work in survivalMC-711 – Redstone and components stay powered after unloading chunksMC-1752 – Breaking Doors moves the other part of the door sometimesMC-5588 – Swords do not lose durability when used on the Ender DragonMC-6551 – Creative Menu potion values are not the same as when brewed (issue redo)MC-7058 – Brewing stand comparator output inconsistentMC-7098 – Non-standard resolutions (and small standard resolutions) not detected properlyMC-7196 – Nether cave/tunnel generator produces incorrect/cut tunnelsMC-7208 – Missing quartz, hopper, and comparator texturesMC-7249 – Quartz slabs and double slabs using wrong textureMC-7520 – Inconsistent distribution system (based on hopper, hopper bug) using rails and minecart-chest over hoppersMC-8328 – Powered mechanisms react when receiving a 0 tick redstone signalMC-8784 – Comparator use off state texture / do not emit any light when poweredMC-9181 – Minecarts with Hoppers duplicating items when multiple carts are in the same spaceMC-9289 – Hitting mobs with a sharpness I wooden sword and weakness III crashes the gameMC-9341 – Powering 2 pistons extends the wrong piston!MC-9357 – Mobs with the old AI have inverted head movementMC-9363 – Rows of Vertical Down Piston Extenders have a >50% failure rateMC-10312 – Minecraft crashes when a saddled pig you ride dies or when changing between rideable entitiesMC-10355 – Animations for items and blocks do not work properlyMC-10415 – Unable to craft with blocks which have a damage value greater than 0MC-10501 – Invisible entities infinite spawn loop (client side) using minecart spawners causing severe performance issues.MC-10503 – Crash when near cropsMC-10510 – View Upside Down with Speed 5 and FOV Quake ProMC-10532 – Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking playerMC-10533 – Same redstone line, two different redstone levelMC-10558 – Internal error when using /effect with an id >31
MC-122 – Unicode font text shadow misalignedMC-1505 – Grass fades under upside-down stairs (except oak wood ones)MC-3114 – Activated detector-rails moved by a piston keep their activated stateMC-3409 – Single player mode, creative mode, E to select block, select block from grid, E to return to game, game freezess, crash log createdMC-7254 – Furnace Tile Entities reproducing - Internal performance bugMC-8184 – Redstone block and torches don't power dispensers, droppers, TNT and NoteblocksMC-8826 – Adding an item to a hopper with a dropper does not change comparator state.MC-9336 – Extending Piston animation missingMC-9460 – Piston retracting disapears if pushed out by another pistonMC-9534 – Issues with Baby Cows' hitboxesMC-10500 – Unicode defined font in texture pack is misfunctional.MC-10543 – Last Direct Multiplayerconnection does not get savedMC-10670 – Hard CrashMC-10679 – Hopper Cool-Down is messed upMC-10694 – Piston arm passes through other pistonMC-10731 – Hoppers facing one another are inconsistent.MC-10778 – Slowness 127 and Speed 110 together flip viewMC-10786 – Comparator doesn't update when a hopper takes in only part of an item stackMC-10825 – Using /clear on more than 1 player will stop clearing inventories once an empty inventory is encounteredMC-10826 – /me cannot use @p correctlyMC-10889 – updated redstone bug (detectorrail)MC-10900 – "/scoreboard teams empty teamName" error message says "%s" instead of the team's name
MC-711 - Redstone and components stay powered after unloading chunksMC-846 - Dispenser and Dropper shooting out when updatedMC-3458 - Server crashes if spaces are input on the consoleMC-6223 - Night Vision Potions that are edited to last longer create a potentially seizure-inducing flashing sky background.MC-8022 - Furnace interface occasionally closes when adding fuel, deleting all items in the furnaceMC-8597 - Named Mobs Don't have Named BabiesMC-10357 - Getting into a minecart with a mob in it crashes minecraftMC-10946 - 2 Hoppers funneling unstackable items into a 3rd Hopper at the same time cause the 3rd Hopper to not funnel items into a containerMC-10948 - Dispensers continually shoot/use certain items like water buckets and flint&steelMC-10950 - Comparators still giving off power when hopper inventory is emptyMC-10956 - Animals can breed over distances up to almost 8 blocks when only seperated by fencesMC-10995 - Message "THIS TOO" in consoleMC-11019 - Full hoppers feeding into full hoppers causes the forward hopper to stallMC-11044 - Adding items to brewing stand using dropper does not change state of comparator

replies.author: su3155323
replies.txt_content: 翻译辛苦了，期待正式版

replies.author: 33娘
replies.txt_content:
前排
果断苦练刷怪技术=L-不能用弓箭各个击破了，牙白
不知道能不能更上时代^_^

replies.txt_content:

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-67114-1-1.html

mc 3.14肯定会添加的啦~别着急哦~

replies.author: 他被河蟹了
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 他被河蟹了 于 2013-2-25 21:59 编辑 

希望有光照测评贴
作为一个专业建筑师，没有什么比这个更让人期待了

replies.author: PTmissionary
replies.txt_content:
翻译辛苦。
就等三月早期了。

replies.author: jianghr
replies.txt_content:
看了投票贴后回来补课。{:10_522:}
增进了解 刷怪蛋（我觉得这样未来会推出训怪功能，搞不好基佬龙也能训 = =，我想起了老滚5龙裔DLC）
投掷器条目我想起来，原来拆分的材质更新可以可以提供方块材质可变的功能。
日光感应器我现在新建一个红石档就用这玩意和137号方块做一个用永昼装置。
增进了解 激活铁轨
增进了解 探测铁轨
TNT矿车我补充一点，13w07a经试验只要脱轨后掉落高度超过4格接触任何非铁轨方块就会炸（水、空气、蜘蛛网神马的应该不会），以前一个版本只要脱轨一接触方块就炸，不管是不是铁轨。
增进了解 水（下面还要水源方块，不然不行，不过海面不再容易破坏了，不过这样BC里面的水泵就几乎不能再抽干一个小水塘，然后……只要有一个水源，其下方8格递降范围内的水流均能被保持）
增进了解 骨粉（果然削弱好多）
增进了解 发射器
